name: Summon Your Courage
description:
You're feeling down. Lacking willpower. Without bravery.

Luckily, you've been experimenting with dark forces. It's time to summon your courage.

-----

SYC is a 2D point and click puzzle/sandbox game. It's all about mystery, so you'll have to figure out the rest for yourself!
It was created for a university assignment using two themes: "No text; no dialog" and "Everyday activities"
